nodes.text: A subterranean facility was one of the Rakata prison structures in the abandoned Rakata machine chamber in the Tomb, an ancient Rakata prison on the planet Belsavis. When the Esh-kha were released from imprisonment, Esh-kha troops under the leadership of Hunter Moon took over the facility and turned it into an interrogation chamber, where they tortured the captured Sith Lord Chayloss.
The Esh-kha interrogation chamber is a location in the Tomb on the planet Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and the site of the Republic mission "Striking the Esh-kha."
